mario.name: Mario
mario.c_e: Spike your opponent offstage with forward aerial.

yoshi.name: Yoshi
yoshi.c_e: Hit 3 projectile eggs (up special) in a row.
yoshi.c_m: Send your opponent offstage with neutral special.
yoshi.c_h: Win the match without using A-moves.

link.name: Link
link.c_e: Retrieve an arrow from the ground and hit the opponent with it.
link.c_m: Take a stock with remote bomb (down special).
link.c_h: Land two blade beams in a row on your opponent.

samus.name: Samus
samus.c_e: Spike your opponent with down aerial.
samus.c_m: Take a stock with a non fully-charged charge shot.
samus.c_h: Hit four uninterrupted forward aerials in a row.

dark_samus.name: Dark Samus
dark_samus.c_e: Land two tethers on your opponent uninterrupted.
dark_samus.c_m: Take a stock with screw attack.
dark_samus.c_h: Win the match without using projectiles.

kirby.name: Kirby
kirby.c_e: Take a stock with down-A offstage.
kirby.c_m: Take a stock by swallowing your opponent offstage and falling until your death.
kirby.c_h: Kill your opponent with their copy ability.

fox.name: Fox
fox.c_e: Get 50% off an opponent's stock with blaster.
fox.c_m: Kill your opponent with shine (down special).
fox.c_h: Rack up 100% damage in 1 stock using only the blaster.

pikachu.name: Pikachu
pikachu.c_e: Go around the bottom of the stage.
pikachu.c_h: Take a stock with a fully charged skull bash (side special).

luigi.name: Luigi
luigi.c_e: Take a stock with up special.
luigi.c_m: Take a stock with a misfired side special.

ness.name: Ness
ness.c_e: Take a stock with PK Flash (neutral special).
ness.c_m: Trap an opponent on the stage's edge with a yoyo.

captain_falcon.name: Captain Falcon
captain_falcon.c_e: Take a stock with the knee.

jigglypuff.name: Jigglypuff
jigglypuff.c_e: Successfully land a sing off the edge of the stage.
jigglypuff.c_h: Take a stock with down special off stage.

peach.name: Peach
peach.c_e: Take a stock with the tennis racket.
peach.c_m: Gimp your opponent offstage with a turnip.

daisy.name: Daisy
daisy.c_e: Take a stock with the frying pan.
daisy.c_m: Land a stitch-faced turnip on your opponent.
daisy.c_h: Take all of your opponent's stocks with counter (neutral special).

bowser.name: Bowser
bowser.c_e: Take your opponent offstage with side-special.
bowser.c_m: Spike opponent offstage with down special.
bowser.c_h: Win while only traversing stage by crawling (crouch walk) for the entire match.

ice_climbers.name: Ice Climbers
ice_climbers.c_h: Win with exclusively SoPo (give Nana the big yeetus).

sheik.name: Sheik
sheik.c_h: Get 20 jabs in on your opponent in one grab.

zelda.name: Zelda
zelda.c_e: Take a stock with the knight (down special).
zelda.c_m: Take a stock with the knight (down special) off-stage.
zelda.c_h: Snipe and KO of someone with up special (no dragging them into it).

dr_mario.name: Dr. Mario
dr_mario.c_e: Take a stock by spiking your opponent offstage.

pichu.name: Pichu
pichu.c_e: Meteor smash your opponent with thunder .

falco.name: Falco
falco.c_e: Land 4 up tilts in a row without getting hit in-between.
falco.c_m: Take every stock with a down air.
falco.c_h: Personally, you prefer the ground (no jumping for the entire match).

marth.name: Marth
marth.c_e: Combo a tipper into a forward smash.
marth.c_m: Take a stock with upward side special.

lucina.name: Lucina
lucina.c_e: Use all three variations of side special during one stock.
lucina.c_m: Take a stock using an airborne counter.

young_link.name: Young Link
young_link.c_e: Recover back to the stage using your bomb.
young_link.c_m: K.O. an airborne opponent with up special.
young_link.c_h: Win the match only using projectiles and grabs.

ganondorf.name: Ganondorf
ganondorf.c_e: Combo side special into side special.
ganondorf.c_m: Pull down opponent with offstage side special.
ganondorf.c_h: Hit an offstage warlock punch (neutral special).

mewtwo.name: Mewtwo
mewtwo.c_m: Disable (down special) opponent twice in the same stock.
mewtwo.c_h: Take a stock with non fully-charged shadow ball (neutral special).

roy.name: Roy
roy.c_e: Land a meteor smash on your opponent.
roy.c_m: Land a fully charged neutral special on opponent.

chrom.name: Chrom
chrom.c_h: Take a stock with suicide up special.

mr_game_and_watch.name: Mr. Game & Watch
mr_game_and_watch.c_h: K.O. with side special other than a 9.

meta_knight.name: Meta Knight
meta_knight.c_e: Say "Fight Me" after every time you use a smash attack on an opponent.
meta_knight.c_m: K.O. opponent using side special offstage.
meta_knight.c_h: Chain a string of five up airs (bing, bang, boom, badda-bap-boom, POW!)

pit.name: Pit
pit.c_e: Combo neutral air into itself 3 times.
pit.c_m: Break your shield (down special) 5 times in one stock.
pit.c_h: K.O. opponent with down air offstage. (It's pretty hard trust me.)

dark_pit.name: Dark Pit
dark_pit.c_e: Take all stocks with electro-shock (side special).
dark_pit.c_m: Up special from one corner of the stage to the other 3 times during the match.
dark_pit.c_h: K.O. opponent with down air offstage. (It's pretty hard trust me.)

zero_suit_samus.name: Zero Suit Samus
zero_suit_samus.c_h: K.O. opponent with down air offstage.

wario.name: Wario
wario.c_m: Chomp (neutral special) an opponent while falling offstage to both of y'all's demise.
wario.c_h: Trip with an uncharged waft (down special).

snake.name: Snake
snake.c_e: Stick a C4 on your opponent.
snake.c_m: K.O. yourself with a C4 at less than 50%.
snake.c_h: Hit someone with the box from Snake's taunts.

ike.name: Ike
ike.c_e: Take your opponent down with you offstage using up special.
ike.c_m: Only do damage by grounding up to 100% for one stock.

pokemon_trainer.name: Pokémon Trainer
pokemon_trainer.c_e: Play just one Pokémon for each stock.
pokemon_trainer.c_h: Swap Pokémon every time you land a hit.

diddy_kong.name: Diddy Kong
diddy_kong.c_e: Get a K.O. with the barrel (up special).
diddy_kong.c_m: Only hit the opponent when they've been tripped by your banana.
diddy_kong.c_h: Take the first 40% of each of your opponent's stocks using only the peanut gun.

lucas.name: Lucas
lucas.c_e: Only recover using the snake (no up special).
lucas.c_m: K.O. your opponent while they are buried.
lucas.c_h: Land all 4 specials in a row without getting hit in between.

sonic.name: Sonic
sonic.c_e: Hit an opponent with spring offstage.
sonic.c_m: Get opponent to jump on the spring.
sonic.c_h: Win without ever turning into a ball.

king_dedede.name: King Dedede
king_dedede.c_m: Kick a gordo (side special) back and forth at least three times (bop bop bop).

olimar.name: Olimar
olimar.c_e: Only have two pikmins max by your side.
olimar.c_h: Win a stock without using any pikmin.

lucario.name: Lucario
lucario.c_e: Take a stock with force palm (command-grab side special).
lucario.c_m: Lock a shielding opponent in neutral special.
lucario.c_h: Purposefully lose two stocks at the beginning of the match.

rob.name: R.O.B.
rob.c_e: Throw a gyro (down special) up in the air and have it hit someone.
rob.c_m: Run out of gas (up special) from full three times during a stock.
rob.c_h: Trap opponent between continuous down tilt and gyro (down special).

toon_link.name: Toon Link
toon_link.c_e: Block 3 attacks with your idle shield.
toon_link.c_m: K.O. your opponent with offstage down air.
toon_link.c_h: Start every stock by dealing 40% to yourself with the bomb.

wolf.name: Wolf
wolf.c_e: Up taunt at the beginning of each stock.
wolf.c_h: Get a K.O. with side special.

villager.name: Villager
villager.c_m: Hit opponent with the wood from your tree.
villager.c_h: Get 10 t-bags off while your opponent is buried.

mega_man.name: Mega Man
mega_man.c_e: Hit your opponent with a side special and then get it to stick to you.
mega_man.c_m: Stick a detonation mine (side special) on the stage and have it hit your opponent.
mega_man.c_h: Take a stock with the pellet gun.

wii_fit_trainer.name: Wii Fit Trainer
wii_fit_trainer.c_m: Only hit opponent under the effects of down special.
wii_fit_trainer.c_h: Hit a buried opponent from afar with the soccer ball.

rosalina_and_luma.name: Rosalina & Luma
rosalina_and_luma.c_e: K.O. someone without the presence of a luma.
rosalina_and_luma.c_m: Successfully edge guard opponent using only luma.
rosalina_and_luma.c_h: Take a stock only using luma.

little_mac.name: Little Mac
little_mac.c_e: Take a stock with K.O. punch.

greninja.name: Greninja
greninja.c_m: Spike an opponent offstage using substitute
greninja.c_h: Get five down aerials in a row without landing.

palutena.name: Palutena
palutena.c_e: Hit an opponent with both variants of side special in a single stock.
palutena.c_h: Take one stock only using neutral air.

pac_man.name: Pac-Man
pac_man.c_e: Force your opponent to jump on the trampoline (up special).
pac_man.c_m: K.O. opponent with a circle made from side special.
pac_man.c_h: Hit opponent with every neutral special variant in one stock.

robin.name: Robin
robin.c_m: Hit your opponent with the green book.
robin.c_h: Combo three side specials into each other.

shulk.name: Shulk
shulk.c_e: K.O. with side special and then say "I'm really feeling it!"
shulk.c_m: Footstool your opponent in jump mode.
shulk.c_h: Take a stock while in shield mode.

bowser_jr.name: Wendy
bowser_jr.c_e: Get a K.O. while out of your cart.
bowser_jr.c_m: Hit yourself with mecha-koopa (down special) 5 times in one stock.
bowser_jr.c_h: Get your opponent to 100% using only down tilt (tongue) for a stock.

duck_hunt.name: Duck Hunt
duck_hunt.c_e: Combo a throw into a dog can.
duck_hunt.c_h: K.O. opponent with gunman (down special) or take stock by spiking with down air.

ryu.name: Ryu
ryu.c_e: Get off a fully-charged down special.
ryu.c_m: Take a stock only using aerials.

cloud.name: Cloud
cloud.c_e: Take opponent's stock using suicide up special.
cloud.c_m: Get a K.O. with down special limit.
cloud.c_h: Get at least 9 limit moves off during the match.

corrin.name: Corrin
corrin.c_e: K.O. your opponent with a non-stick side special.
corrin.c_m: K.O. opponent with neutral special's dragon chomper.

bayonetta.name: Bayonetta
bayonetta.c_m: Successfully guard your opponent with the heel (down smash).
bayonetta.c_h: Get 3 witch time moves in a row without getting hit in-between.

inkling.name: Inkling
inkling.c_e: Take a stock after emptying all your ink.
inkling.c_m: Bury your opponent with roller 3 times in one stock.
inkling.c_h: Play the whole game with empty ink reserves.

ridley.name: Ridley
ridley.c_e: Spike an opponent with up special.
ridley.c_m: Drag your opponent to your doom with side special.

simon.name: Simon
simon.c_e: Take a stock with up special.
simon.c_m: Catch your own holy water (down special).

richter.name: Richter
richter.c_e: Crouch walk across the stage without being interrupted.
richter.c_m: Chain at least three down airs.

king_k_rool.name: King K. Rool
king_k_rool.c_e: Take a stock off after burying with down tilt.
king_k_rool.c_h: Take a stock with the propellor (up special).

isabelle.name: Isabelle
isabelle.c_e: Take a stock using slingshot (side special).
isabelle.c_m: Gimp an opponent with fishing rod.
isabelle.c_h: Hit an opponent with a manually triggered lloid rocket (down special).

incineroar.name: Incineroar
incineroar.c_e: Take a stock by using darkest lariate (neutral special) offstage.
incineroar.c_m: Deal over 70 damage with a single hit by unleashing charge through side special.
incineroar.c_h: Take a stock by carrying your opponent with a suicide up special off stage.

piranha_plant.name: Piranha Plant
piranha_plant.c_m: Grab and trap an opponent in the poisonous cloud (side special).
piranha_plant.c_h: Take a stock with up special.

joker.name: Joker
joker.c_e: Grab an opponent out of the air with tether (up special).
joker.c_m: Take a stock with the first hit of Arsène.
joker.c_h: Take a stock using guns offstage.

hero.name: Hero
hero.c_e: Win the match without using the spell menu (down special).
hero.c_m: Take a stock with magic burst.

banjo_and_kazooie.name: Banjo & Kazooie
banjo_and_kazooie.c_e: Recover offstage by hitting yourself with your own grenade.
banjo_and_kazooie.c_m: Hit your opponent with the platform that falls down from up special.
banjo_and_kazooie.c_h: Use down taunt after every successful hit on your opponent.

terry.name: Terry
terry.c_e: Get a "Go Move" off on your opponent.
terry.c_m: Live for a minute after getting Go Meter.
terry.c_h: Win while only starting to play each stock once you have Go.

byleth.name: Byleth
byleth.c_e: Land a down special on your opponent.
byleth.c_m: Grab an opponent offstage with up special.
byleth.c_h: Take a stock with down special.

min_min.name: Min Min
min_min.c_e: Land each arm in a row on your opponent uninterrupted.
min_min.c_m: Take a stock without using your arms.
min_min.c_h: Win the match without using your arms.

steve.name: Steve
steve.c_e: Build an "L" out of blocks in the middle of the match.
steve.c_h: Build an "F out of blocks in the middle of the match.

sephiroth.name: Sephiroth
sephiroth.c_e: Stack five shadowflares (side special) on your opponent.
sephiroth.c_h: Take a stock offstage with octo-slash (up special).

pyra_and_mythra.name: Pyra/Mythra
pyra_and_mythra.c_e: Take a stock with neutral special.
pyra_and_mythra.c_m: Use Pyra to deal damage and Mythra to take each stock.
pyra_and_mythra.c_h: For one whole stock or more, get your opponent to at least 200% only using Pyra.

kazuya.name: Kazuya
kazuya.c_e: Get your opponent to 100% using only 10-hit combo (jabs).
kazuya.c_m: Take a stock at the stage's edge with down smash.
